entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of light snow. Low minus 14. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of light snow. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this evening then light near midnight. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 11.

entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming southwest 30 overnight. Temperature rising to minus 7 by morning. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
